TopicTitle: Staging safety don't separate capsule from upper stage then in deep space or landing on the Mun.

Articles.Content:
In short respect that I add some empty staging events before the important ones like dropping the service module on an mun decent then you just want to drop the crashing stage. 
Or press go instead of telling K2-D2 to do some burn or press space by accident. 
Again adding extra stages help here.
Some other safety could work better but just accepting empty stagings would help a lot.
